Summary: Object appeared unexpectedly while I intended to photograph Las Vegas' fireworks display.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around July 4th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailseach year las vegas puts on a fantastic fireworks display along the las vegas strip. each casino\hotel sets off their own display so i decided to drive west of town to get a panoramic view of all the displays on my camera. photo was snapped with a sharp digital camcorder model vl-z5 set at infinity. the craft appeared without notice. i snapped this photo and lost track of time. i seriously do not recall any other details. this is the most detailed photo of a ufo i have ever seen. i would refer to this craft as dome shaped. because it contains almost every color of the rainbow, i call this craft the "rainbow transport". this is very hard for me to admit, but i feel that i experienced the sensation of "missing time" and do not recall any additional details. the craft appeared above me about 200 ft. high and 100 yards away. i do not recall the craft leaving my sight.
